name: Mediator Pattern
description: Implement a chat room mediator. Given messages as [sender, 'send'/'private', content/recipient, message?], the mediator routes messages. 'send' broadcasts to all except sender. 'private' sends only to recipient. Return all received messages as [recipient, sender, message].
hints: The mediator centralizes communication. Track users and route messages through the mediator rather than direct user-to-user communication.
